question: In which nation "Barbilla National Park" is located?
explanation: Barbilla National Park is located in Costa Rica. It is governed by the National System of Conservation Areas. It is located in the Caribbean La Amistad Conservation Area. It lies in the eastern slopes of Talamanca mountain range. This national houses the "Cabecar" tribes, the second-largest indigenous group in Costa Rica. It lies in the Dantas River Watershed area.
